xdi2.messaging.container.execution

Class ExecutionResult

  • java.lang.Object
    • xdi2.messaging.container.execution.ExecutionResult

  • public final class ExecutionResult
extends Object
    This class represent a result of a message envelope that has been executed against a messaging container. Basically this encapsulates the results of all the individual operations in the message envelope. The merged result graphs of the individual operations constitute the overall result graph. This can be used to create a messaging response which a responder would return to a requester.
